capabilities.name: init-browser
capabilities.description: Initialize a browser with a URL

capabilities.name: get-full-dom
capabilities.description: Get the full DOM of the current page. (Deprecated, use get-context instead)

capabilities.name: get-screenshot
capabilities.description: Get a screenshot of the current page

capabilities.name: execute-code
capabilities.description: Execute custom Playwright JS code against the current page

capabilities.name: get-context
capabilities.description: Get the website context which would be used to write the testcase
